channel.title: Cadmium Tolerance on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Cadmium Tolerance on funPlantGenes

item.title: BjCdR15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjCdR15 Gene Name: BZIP transcription factor15 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: The Brassica juncea BjCdR15, an ortholog of Arabidopsis TGA3, is a regulator of cadmium uptake, transport and accumulation in shoots and confers cadmium tolerance in transgenic plants.

item.title: BjCET1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjCET1 Gene Name: cation-efflux transporter 1 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: BjCET1 contains 382 amino acid residues, including a signature motif of the cation diffusion facilitator protein family, six classic trans-membrane-spanning structures and a cation-efflux domain.

item.title: JrVHAG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrVHAG1 Gene Name: vacuolar H+-ATPase G 1 Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrVHAG1 is involved in plant abiotic strss response.

item.title: MdSOS2L1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSOS2L1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: PvERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PHAVU_007G193300g Gene Symbol: PvERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR15 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Transcription Factors PvERF15 and PvMTF-1 Form a Cadmium Stress Transcriptional Pathway.
